root.name: Gulf War: Operation Desert Hammer
root.description: Gulf War: Operation Desert Hammer is a game about the M1 tanks, and was one of the first games about Desert Storm. This game features 18 single-player missions, and multiplayer support for up to eight players via Internet, LAN, modem, and serial port. Gulf War is also a fast-paced arcade-style action game, that allows players to command stealth fighters, helicopters, and missiles.
